00020 template<class GridImp>
00021 class FoamGridHierarchicIterator :
00022         public Dune::FoamGridEntityPointer <0,GridImp>
00023 {
00024     enum {dimworld = GridImp::dimensionworld};
00025     
00026     friend class FoamGridEntity<0,GridImp::dimension,GridImp>;
00027 
00028     public:
00029         
00030         typedef typename GridImp::template Codim<0>::Entity Entity;
00031 
00033     FoamGridHierarchicIterator(int maxlevel) 
00034         : FoamGridEntityPointer<0,GridImp>(NULL),
00035           maxlevel_(maxlevel)
00036     {}
00037         
00039         void increment()
00040         {
00041             if (elemStack.empty())
00042                 return;
00043             
00044             const FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>* old_target = elemStack.top();
00045             elemStack.pop();
00046             
00047             // Traverse the tree no deeper than maxlevel
00048             if (old_target->level_ < maxlevel_) {
00049                 
00050                 // Load sons of old target onto the iterator stack
00051                 if (!old_target->isLeaf()) {
00052                     
00053                     for (int i=0; i<old_target->nSons(); i++)
00054                         elemStack.push(old_target->sons_[i]);
00055                     
00056                 }
00057                 
00058             }
00059             
00060             this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget((elemStack.empty()) 
00061                                              ? NULL : elemStack.top());
00062         }
00063 
00064         
00065 private:
00066         
00068     int maxlevel_;
00069 
00071     std::stack<const FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>*> elemStack;
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 }  // end namespace Dune
00076 
00077 #endif
